footer.description: Easily complete all your administrative procedures on this site.

legal.metadataDescription: Important legal information, policies, and disclaimers.
legal.article1Content: The GLIDER site is published by ORION APPLICATIONS, an SARL company, with a share capital of €2,000, with its headquarters at 61 Route de Saint Pierre 84600 Valréas. The legal representative of the company is Mr. GROS.
legal.article1Contact: To contact the publisher, please use the following email address: mxm.grs@icloud.com
legal.article2Content: The GLIDER site is hosted by Azure, a company whose legal form is not indicated on the site.
legal.article3Content: Access to the site and its use are strictly reserved for personal use. As a user, you agree not to use this site and the information or data contained therein for commercial, political, advertising purposes, or for any form of commercial solicitation, including sending unsolicited emails.
legal.article4Content: All distinctive elements such as trademarks, logos, graphics, photographs, animations, videos, and texts present on this website are the exclusive intellectual property of ORION APPLICATIONS. Any reproduction, use, or representation of these elements without the express permission of ORION APPLICATIONS is likely to result in legal action.
legal.article5Content: ORION APPLICATIONS strives to ensure the accuracy and updating of the information disseminated on this site. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is always complete, accurate, and up to date.
legal.article6Content: For any questions regarding the use of the site, you can contact us at the following email address: mxm.grs@icloud.com

newEstimate.metadataDescription: Create an estimate for your business.
newEstimate.estimateForBusiness: Create an estimate for your business.
newEstimate.conditionsText: This estimate is valid for three months. Regarding payment, one third upon ordering and the balance upon delivery.

privacyPolicy.metadataDescription: How this website gathers, uses, discloses and manages client's data.
privacyPolicy.content: This site does not collect or store any personal data from visitors.
